titleStmt.title: A briefe ansvver to a scandalous pamphlet, entituled A speech made at a common hall by Alderman Garroway. With some few observations upon other pamphlets of the like nature, especially that called A letter sent into Milk-street.

notesStmt.note: In reply to : A speech made at a common hall by Alderman Garroway.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
